messages.subject: Re: [SHQ] Time to pay respect to our fallen leaders.
messages.msgSnippet: Here are a couple pictures.  I say go with carnations. They re pretty and they last long :)
messages.messageBody:
Here are a couple pictures. I say go with carnations. They're pretty and they last long :)

messages.subject: Time to pay respect to our fallen leaders.
messages.msgSnippet: Next week is the death of Hijikata Toshi and Kondo Isami. I like to honor them in my home by lighting incents. this year i would like to do it with there
messages.messageBody:
Next week is the death of Hijikata Toshi and Kondo Isami. I like to
honor them in my home by lighting incents. this year i would like to do
it with there pictures and some flowers. Can some one send me a photo
of Hijikata-sama? i tried googleing it and only got animes and nhk
shinsengumi. Also if any one could tell me what flowers would be good
to use i would appreciate it. thank you to who ever response.
